title: TO SMILE IN AUTUMN BY VAGABOND MAURICE
description:
The official music video for Vagabond Maurice's song 'To Smile in Autumn'
    Produced and animated by the Sleepy Gallows.
    A Garden at the End of the World album available now
     Production by Brad Kemp Featuring TayyyySlayyy & Pradia Additional Vocals by hyesoo Quote/Passage from “No Mud, No Lotus” by Thich Nhat Hanh Recorded/Mix & Mastered at Second Bedroom Studio
    Follow Vagabond Maurice
    Website: http://www.vagabondmaurice.com/
    Twitter: https://twitter.com/VagabondMaurice

title: DOUBLE MIND BY JUSTIN FAMOUS
description: We at the Sleepy Gallows got to animate this great song by Justin Famous about the challenges of balancing life, career, staying true to yourself, and providing for loved ones. It’s a really good song with some pretty cool visuals (if we do say so ourselves) Hope you enjoyed it! You can find Justin Famous at: JustinFamous.com Instagram/Twitter : @JustinFamous_ Purchase Link:HTTP://SMARTURL.IT/0JPON5 Animation by Sleepy Gallows Official animated Music Video by Justin Famous with featured vocals from J. Artiz. © Sworv Nation 2018
